summary: changes the 3rd Person Camera Position when in Combat
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/20663-1-1352305871.jpg[/img]
Even though i mostly play in First Person I've always hated how the Camera flies away when you unsheathe your weapon when in 3rd person so this mod changes the 3rd Person Camera Position when you unsheathe your weapon

I know that there are other mods similar to this but none of them quite suit what i want so i decided to make my own and share it

works with swords, melee, bows and magic spells

see pictures for better detail

Note: Optimized for Melee combat but still works for bows and spells at medium range, i just switch back to 1st person view when targeting enemies with bows at very long ranges anyway

(here's a better setting made by alinexus)
[Camera]
fOverShoulderCombatAddY=0.0000
fOverShoulderCombatPosZ=-10.0000
fOverShoulderCombatPosX=30.0000
